p: Additionally, OSCN − seems able to alter the surface proteins of different respiratory viruses, probably by oxidizing free thiol radicals and creating disulfide bonds ( Alaxia, 2020), thus contrasting the binding of viruses with the human airways mucosae. OSCN − may also arguably hamper the synthesis and assemblance of viral proteins and nucleic acids, thus interfering with the release of viruses from infected cells ( Day, 2020; Cegolon et al., 2014; Cegolon, 2020).
